Read allElliot, a brilliant but unstable cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global chaos when he and his shadowy allies try to take down the corrupt corporation his company is paid to protect.Elliot, a brilliant but unstable cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global chaos when he and his shadowy allies try to take down the corrupt corporation his company is paid to protect. Browse episodes The Rise of BD Wong The Rise of BD Wong BD Wong, known for his roles in Jurassic Park,"Oz," and "Law & Order: SVU," returns as cyber-terrorist Whiterose in the final season of "Mr. Robot." What other roles has he played?
